job_details.degree_required: College degree Computer Science, or other related field preferred.

jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well!!My name is Deepali Jha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title: Sr .Net Application DeveloperVisa: Only USC & GCLocation: Hybrid [Local only] - Charlotte, NC, Hartford, CT or Branchville, NJ (hybrid – 3 days a week in the office)Duration: 6-12 monthsExperience: 8+ Years Must have Updated LinkedIn [Kforce]Front & back must if GC Job Description:Must have:• Experienced .Net Developer - mid-tier level• Really good communication skills• Huge plus if coming from an insurance company Day to DayThe .Net developer will be working on workflows, which is where ProCede comes in. Note you're not looking for a candidate that worked for the vendor ProCede; this is a catch all role - meaning it's more about understanding the workflow.Responsible to start with modifying systems Responsibilities:• Meet with business unit representatives to define and evaluate routine business automation needs. Interpret business specifications to prepare for analysis/design functions.• Participate in systems analysis, general systems design, and detail systems design.• Generate, test, and document program code. Debug and resolve problems of moderate difficulty.• Modify existing applications programs or writes new programs of basic to moderate complexity and scope, working with applications systems designs and specifications and utilizing standards, procedures, and techniques.• Install, configure, and support applications running on Windows Server• Research and resolve problems in the production environment.• Assist others with debugging whenever necessary.• Responsible to acquire training, as needed, and will learn user functions, organization, and role in the enterprise to the extent required.• Systems to support, administer and improve: o ProCede  Runs on Windows Server + SQLServer. Technologies: CMD/Bat + C# .Net + Microfocus Cobol. ProCede Admin skills are desirable, but insurance background and aptitude to learn ProCede/Reinsurance will worko Smaller Vendor Supplied Systems:  Wells Fargo Travel & Expense Others… Custom Finance Applications Qualifications:• 5+ years of experience in windows application/ system administration• Understanding of Insurance and / or reinsurance desirable.• OR Financial/Accounting system experience desirable• Ability to easily move between multiple projects at any given time.• Requires excellent communication skills, analytic ability, strong judgment and the ability to work directly with customers and IT management and staff.• Requires the interest and ability to acquire a deep knowledge of business functions and systems, and offer application development technological alternatives.• Strong interpersonal communication skills.• College degree Computer Science, or other related field preferred.• Java Development Experience• MVC & C# .Net Development Experience• ProCede experience helpful Highlights - overall looking for someone who has:• Worked in departments specifically: finance IT / corp IT / shared services IT )• Knows how to support applications: runs teams, sysadmins, appadmins• Balanced development experience: C#, .Net, Java, full stack, etc.• bonus is insurance domain / fiserv domain• Soft skills must be evidence and self-driven, strength-of-schedule, go-getter, no baby sitting
